title: Looking at plants
creator_credit: Jim Harris, John Bird and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
brief_description: Filmed in the Sherbrooke Forest Park, Australflora Nursery, Victoria, and shows glimpses of the plant and insect life which abound there. No narration, music only.
creator_credit_for_label: Jim Harris, John Bird and Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
